problem_names:
lemma \<Z>_vfsequenceI[intro]:
  assumes "\<Z> \<alpha>" and "vfsequence \<SS>" and "\<R>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS> \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>"
  shows "\<Z>_vfsequence \<alpha> \<SS>"

lemma \<Z>_vfsequenceE[elim]:
  assumes "\<Z>_vfsequence \<alpha> \<SS>"
  obtains "\<Z> \<alpha>" and "vfsequence \<SS>" and "\<R>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS> \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>"

lemma \<Z>_tsI[intro]:
  assumes "\<Z>_vfsequence \<alpha> \<SS>"
    and "2\<^sub>\<nat> \<le> vcard \<SS>"
    and "\<And>A. A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> A \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr>"
    and "\<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>"
    and "\<And>A B. A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> A \<inter>\<^sub>\<circ> B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>"
    and "\<And>X. X \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> \<Union>\<^sub>\<circ>X \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>"
  shows "\<Z>_ts \<alpha> \<SS>"

lemma \<Z>_tsD[dest]:
  assumes "\<Z>_ts \<alpha> \<SS>"
  shows "\<Z>_vfsequence \<alpha> \<SS>"
    and "2\<^sub>\<nat> \<le> vcard \<SS>"
    and "\<And>A. A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> A \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr>"
    and "\<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>"
    and "\<And>A B. A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> A \<inter>\<^sub>\<circ> B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>"
    and "\<And>X. X \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> \<Union>\<^sub>\<circ>X \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>"

lemma \<Z>_tsE[elim]:
  assumes "\<Z>_ts \<alpha> \<SS>"
  obtains "\<Z>_vfsequence \<alpha> \<SS>"
    and "2\<^sub>\<nat> \<le> vcard \<SS>"
    and "\<And>A. A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> A \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr>"
    and "\<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>"
    and "\<And>A B. A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> A \<inter>\<^sub>\<circ> B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>"
    and "\<And>X. X \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> \<Union>\<^sub>\<circ>X \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<omega> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>
  \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<omega>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>

using this:
  \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS> \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>
  \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<omega>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>

locale \<Z>_ts = \<Z>_vfsequence \<alpha> \<SS> for \<alpha> \<SS> +
  assumes \<Z>_ts_length: "2\<^sub>\<nat> \<le> vcard \<SS>" 
    and \<Z>_ts_closed[intro]: "A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> A \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr>"
    and \<Z>_ts_domain[intro, simp]: "\<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>"
    and \<Z>_ts_vintersection[intro]: 
      "A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> A \<inter>\<^sub>\<circ> B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>"
    and \<Z>_ts_VUnion[intro]: "X \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> \<Union>\<^sub>\<circ>X \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>"

lemma \<Z>_tsI[intro]:
  assumes "\<Z>_vfsequence \<alpha> \<SS>"
    and "2\<^sub>\<nat> \<le> vcard \<SS>"
    and "\<And>A. A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> A \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr>"
    and "\<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>"
    and "\<And>A B. A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> A \<inter>\<^sub>\<circ> B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>"
    and "\<And>X. X \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> \<Union>\<^sub>\<circ>X \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>"
  shows "\<Z>_ts \<alpha> \<SS>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Z>_vfsequence \<alpha> \<SS>
  2\<^sub>\<nat> \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> vcard \<SS>
  ?A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow>
  ?A \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr>
  \<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>
  \<lbrakk>?A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>;
   ?B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?A \<inter>\<^sub>\<circ> ?B
                    \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>
  ?X \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow>
  \<Union>\<^sub>\<circ> ?X \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Z>_ts \<alpha> \<SS>

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Z>_vfsequence \<alpha> \<SS>
  2\<^sub>\<nat> \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> vcard \<SS>
  ?A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow>
  ?A \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr>
  \<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>
  \<lbrakk>?A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>;
   ?B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?A \<inter>\<^sub>\<circ> ?B
                    \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>
  ?X \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow>
  \<Union>\<^sub>\<circ> ?X \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Z>_vfsequence \<alpha> \<SS> \<and>
    (2\<^sub>\<nat> \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> vcard \<SS> \<and>
     (\<forall>A.
         A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<longrightarrow>
         A \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr>)) \<and>
    \<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr>
    \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<and>
    (\<forall>A B.
        A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<longrightarrow>
        B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<longrightarrow>
        A \<inter>\<^sub>\<circ> B
        \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>) \<and>
    (\<forall>X.
        X \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<longrightarrow>
        \<Union>\<^sub>\<circ> X
        \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>)

lemma \<Z>_tsD[dest]:
  assumes "\<Z>_ts \<alpha> \<SS>"
  shows "\<Z>_vfsequence \<alpha> \<SS>"
    and "2\<^sub>\<nat> \<le> vcard \<SS>"
    and "\<And>A. A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> A \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr>"
    and "\<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>"
    and "\<And>A B. A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> A \<inter>\<^sub>\<circ> B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>"
    and "\<And>X. X \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> \<Union>\<^sub>\<circ>X \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Z>_vfsequence \<alpha> \<SS> &&&
     2\<^sub>\<nat> \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> vcard \<SS> &&&
     (\<And>A.
         A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow>
         A \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr>)) &&&
    \<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr>
    \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> &&&
    (\<And>A B.
        \<lbrakk>A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>;
         B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> A \<inter>\<^sub>\<circ> B
                          \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>) &&&
    (\<And>X.
        X \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow>
        \<Union>\<^sub>\<circ> X
        \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>)

  assumes "\<Z>_ts \<alpha> \<SS>"
  obtains "\<Z>_vfsequence \<alpha> \<SS>"

    and "\<And>A. A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow> A \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> \<SS>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr>"

definition ts_indiscrete :: "V \<Rightarrow> V"
  where "ts_indiscrete A = [A, set {0, A}]\<^sub>\<circ>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ts_indiscrete A\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr> = A

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. [A, ZFC_in_HOL.set
         {[]\<^sub>\<circ>, A}]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr> =
    A

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ts_indiscrete A\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> =
    ZFC_in_HOL.set {[]\<^sub>\<circ>, A}

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. [A, ZFC_in_HOL.set
         {[]\<^sub>\<circ>, A}]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> =
    ZFC_in_HOL.set {[]\<^sub>\<circ>, A}

proof (state)
goal (6 subgoals):
 1. \<Z>_vfsequence \<alpha> (ts_indiscrete A)
 2. 2\<^sub>\<nat> \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> vcard (ts_indiscrete A)
 3. \<And>Aa.
       Aa \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> ts_indiscrete
                               A\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow>
       Aa \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> ts_indiscrete A\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr>
 4. ts_indiscrete A\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr>
    \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> ts_indiscrete A\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>
 5. \<And>Aa B.
       \<lbrakk>Aa \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> ts_indiscrete A\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>;
        B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> ts_indiscrete A\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Aa \<inter>\<^sub>\<circ> B
                         \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> ts_indiscrete
        A\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>
 6. \<And>X.
       X \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> ts_indiscrete
                                    A\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow>
       \<Union>\<^sub>\<circ> X
       \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> ts_indiscrete A\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<Z> \<alpha>
 2. vfsequence (ts_indiscrete A)
 3. \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (ts_indiscrete A)
    \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. vfsequence [A, ZFC_in_HOL.set {[]\<^sub>\<circ>, A}]\<^sub>\<circ>

proof (state)
this:
  vfsequence (ts_indiscrete A)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<Z> \<alpha>
 2. \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (ts_indiscrete A)
    \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<R>\<^sub>\<circ>
                              (ts_indiscrete A) \<Longrightarrow>
       x \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<R>\<^sub>\<circ>
                              (ts_indiscrete A) \<Longrightarrow>
       x \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>

proof (state)
this:
  x \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (ts_indiscrete A)

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (ts_indiscrete A)

goal (1 subgoal):

     thesis\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<R>\<^sub>\<circ>
                         [A, ZFC_in_HOL.set
                              {[]\<^sub>\<circ>, A}]\<^sub>\<circ>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x = A \<Longrightarrow> thesis;
     x = ZFC_in_HOL.set {[]\<^sub>\<circ>, A} \<Longrightarrow>
     thesis\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> thesis

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>x = A \<Longrightarrow> ?thesis;
   x = ZFC_in_HOL.set {[]\<^sub>\<circ>, A} \<Longrightarrow>
   ?thesis\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?thesis

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<R>\<^sub>\<circ>
                              (ts_indiscrete A) \<Longrightarrow>
       x \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<lbrakk>x = A \<Longrightarrow> ?thesis;
   x = ZFC_in_HOL.set {[]\<^sub>\<circ>, A} \<Longrightarrow>
   ?thesis\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>x = A \<Longrightarrow> ?thesis;
   x = ZFC_in_HOL.set {[]\<^sub>\<circ>, A} \<Longrightarrow>
   ?thesis\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?thesis

goal (5 subgoals):
 1. 2\<^sub>\<nat> \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> vcard (ts_indiscrete A)
 2. \<And>Aa.
       Aa \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> ts_indiscrete
                               A\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow>
       Aa \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> ts_indiscrete A\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr>
 3. ts_indiscrete A\<lparr>\<A>\<rparr>
    \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> ts_indiscrete A\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>
 4. \<And>Aa B.
       \<lbrakk>Aa \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> ts_indiscrete A\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>;
        B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> ts_indiscrete A\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Aa \<inter>\<^sub>\<circ> B
                         \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> ts_indiscrete
        A\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>
 5. \<And>X.
       X \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> ts_indiscrete
                                    A\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr> \<Longrightarrow>
       \<Union>\<^sub>\<circ> X
       \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> ts_indiscrete A\<lparr>\<T>\<rparr>
